document.full_text: former world number one amelie mauresmo has been barred from playing the french open mixed doubles because she is not registered in the anti-doping program, organizers said on wednesday.
document.title: open-mauresmo barred from mixed doubles over anti-doping
lines_and_colors: former world number one amelie mauresmo has been barred from playing the french open mixed doubles because she is not registered in the anti-doping program, organizers said on wednesday.
